firstNightReminder: City guard may choose a non-demon character, they become a prisoner.
otherNightReminder: City guard may choose a non-demon character, they become a prisoner.
name: City guard
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a non-demon character: they become a prisoner.

otherNightReminder: If a mistress died today, one of the chosen players dies.
name: Mistress
ability: On your 1st night, choose two players: they learn who you are. If you died today, one of them dies tonight.

name: Stablekeeper
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player. They are drunk today, can't die tomorrow and you learn who they are the day after tomorrow.

firstNightReminder: Jezus Christ may point to a player. If they do, show thumbs or thumbs down.
otherNightReminder: Jezus Christ may point to a player. If they do, show thumbs or thumbs down.
name: Jezus Christ
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player. Learn whether they are evil.

firstNightReminder: Show thumbs up or thumbs down
otherNightReminder: Show thumbs up or thumbs down
name: Prophet
ability: Each night, learn whether you die next night. You can't die that night if you learned no.

name: Baker
ability: You start knowing 3 characters, 1 is your neighbour, 1 is not in play and 1 is a neighbour to an evil player.

name: Archangel
ability: On your first night, minions become your alignment and don't learn who the demon is. When you die, minions become good.

name: Houndmaster
ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are a neighbour to an evil player. [-1 or +1 outsider]

otherNightReminder: If Pig farmer died today, show them a character token of another dead player.
name: Pig farmer
ability: If you died today, learn a character of another dead player.

otherNightReminder: Private eye chooses a character, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
firstNightReminder: Private eye chooses a character, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Private eye
ability: Each night, choose a character: learn if they are in play. Once per game, at night, you are drunk.

name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a good player. That player is drunk while you are alive.

otherNightReminder: A good player becomes drunk if evil died today. Show the Cremator a number.
name: Cremator
ability: If an evil player died today, a good player is drunk until dusk tomorrow. Each night*, learn how many players are drunk or poisoned.

otherNightReminder: If the Shaman chose a character today, show 'you are' token to a player and then the chosen character token
name: Shaman
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a character. If not in the game, an alive player becomes that character this night.

name: Zombie
ability: Once per game, at night, you might be resurrected.

name: Old Harry
ability: The first time an alive player says 'Old Harry', they die immediately.

name: Bodyguard
ability: You start knowing a player. If they are executed, you die instead.

name: Prisoner
ability: While the City guard lives, you can't die. [+City guard]

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a non-demon character to become. Wake that character and show them 'you are' token and then Judas token
name: Judas
ability: Each night*, you may choose a character you become. If that character is in the game, they die and become a Judas.

otherNightReminder: Krampus points to alive player. A player chosen the previous night might be resurrected.
name: Krampus
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: If not a demon, they die and might be resurrected next night.

otherNightReminder: If Cockroach died today, point to evil demons.
name: The Cockroach
ability: You think you are an outsider, but you are not. When you die, you learn who the evil demons are. [+1 evil outsider]

firstNightReminder: Basilisk points to a player, wake them and show 'this player is' token and point to the Basilisk.
otherNightReminder: Basilisk points to a player, wake them and show 'this player is' token and point to the Basilisk. All chosen player die this night if Basilisk died today.
name: Basilisk
ability: Each night, you may choose a player: they learn who you are. If you die, all chosen players die this night.

otherNightReminder: Kugutsu points to a player. Choose a player who dies.
name: Kugutsu
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they are evil until dusk. A player dies each night*.

otherNightReminder: Ghuul is resurrected. Ghuul points to a player.
name: Ghuul
ability: Each night*, you are resurrected and choose a player: they die. Evil loses if & only if all other evil players are dead.

otherNightReminder: Saint nicholas points to a player. The Archangel might die if a player was mad about being a minion.
name: Saint nicholas
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a player was mad about being a minion, the Archangel might die at night. [+Krampus, +Archangel]

name: Chernobog
ability: You start knowing a player. When you die, they become a demon. Each night*, choose one of their alive neighbours: they die.
